description:
• Do you want to be a YouTube Rockstar?
  • Do you want to get more views and subscribers on YouTube?
  • Do you wish you could get your YouTube videos to rank #1 in Google and YouTube?

In this course I will show you how to become a successful YouTuber. I will share my screen and channel and teach you some of my YouTube experiences, secrets, strategies & tactics with you so that you can achieve RESULTS. Now before you start taking this course, Convince Yourself - Here is my YouTube Channel . What I teach - works!

*Last course update 4/19/14

I even wrote a #1 best-selling book about YouTube that is available on Amazon "YouTube Video Marketing Secrets Revealed: The Beginners Guide to Online Video Marketing." This course is not based on theory, it's based on RESULTS. Over 20 Amazon Verified Reviewshttp://www.YouTubeSecretsRevealed.com

Over 2 hours of content and 21 Videos that will teach you how to:

  • Understand the Importance of YouTube Video Marketing
  • Start and Optimize Your YouTube Channel
  • Use simple techniques for using keyword tools to choose title names and tags
  • Build an amazing online community and loyal following
  • Set up Google Adsense
  • Embed video in posts on website
  • Build a list using YouTube
  • Effectively use time limits in video
  • Transcribe videos for products
  • Build confidence and inspire others online

What you’ve done worked for you but how do I know it will work for me? That is a self-limiting belief! Video marketing is proven to work! I already have a You Tube Channel…why do I need to do this? You don’t. You can spend 4 years’ figuring out what works like I did or you can put a plan in action to be intentional and learn how to make money online. I have a channel with no views. Why are you still reading this? Get signed up!

Includes:

  • Full 2-hour Video Module Training Center
  • Lifetime Access
  • 30 day Money Back Guarantee
    •
title: How to Become a YouTube Rockstar
